recipeData.title: Panir Grilled Sandwitch
recipeData.recipe:
1.To cook the potatoes and peas in a stovetop pressure cooker. 
2. For the stovetop pressure cooker, remove the lid after all the pressure falls in the cooker.

recipeData.title: Mathri Abhi
recipeData.ingridents:
2 cups wheat flour (atta)
¼ cup besan (optional, refer notes)
6 tablespoons semolina (fine rava)

1 to 1¼ teaspoon salt (adjust to taste)
1 teaspoon carom seeds (ajwain)
1 tablespoon kasuri methi (dried fenugreek leaves)
1 teaspoon onion seeds (kalonji, optional)
1 teaspoon pepper (crushed)
recipeData.recipe:
1. Add these ingredients to a large mixing bowl:
2 cups of whole wheat flour,
1/4 cup of besan (gram flour),
6 tablespoons semolina (I used whole wheat fine rava)

1 to 1¼ teaspoon salt
